title: Paul Pogba’s brother Mathias was the reason he left Manchester United in 2012 after begging him to join Juventus
text:
Comments PAUL POGBA’S brother has revealed how he begged the midfielder to quit Manchester United for Juventus. 
France international Pogba left Old Trafford for the Italian giants in 2012, with the 23-year-old winning four Serie A titles before rejoining United for a record £89million last summer. Getty 9 Paul Pogba left Man United back in 2012 after being part of successful youth side with Jesse Lingard and Ravel Morrison 
Pogba made just seven senior appearances for Sir Alex Ferguson’s side following his 2009 move from Le Havre. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary. 
And brother Mathias, 26, has told how he urged Paul to ignore personal pleas from Fergie and French club-mate Patrice Evra to stay put. 
Sparta Rotterdam striker Mathias told De Telegraaf : “I told Paul in 2012 that he had to leave United for the sake of his career. Mathias Pogba wears half-and-half shirts in support of brothers Paul and Florentin Twitter: Paul Pogba Mathias Pogba (left) urged Paul to leave Man United in 2012 to join Juventus PA:Press Association Pogba brothers Paul and Florentin played against each other last week in Europe PA:Press Association Paul Pogba was talked into a move away from Old Trafford by his family 
"You can ask him this for yourself. 
"My mother and I were at Paul's house when Alex Ferguson and Patrice Evra came round to convince Paul to stay with United when he wanted to leave for Juventus . 
"Paul was just playing for the reserves, or getting the occasional ten or 20 minutes with the first team. Getty Images Paul Pogba joined Manchester United for a world-record fee last summer from Juventus Maverick Photography Paul Pogba drove to Old Trafford with other brother Mathias last Thursday News Group Newspapers Ltd 9 Mathias Pogba currently plays for Sparta Rotterdam after spells at Partick Thistle and Crawley 
"I told him that with the abilities he possessed he should not let himself be sent out on loan. 
"This is what was happening with United's other talented young players such as Danny Welbeck and Tom Cleverley. 
"Later on I told Paul: 'You've got to leave, no matter how much you like Manchester and the club. Reuters Paul Pogba is starting to show signs of life after a slow restart to his Prem career PA:Press Association Paul Pogba spent four years at Serie A giants Juventus Paul Pogba’s brother Florentin tells all about the Manchester United midfielder 
"'But if you go on to do your stuff on the pitch they will come to appreciate you once again'. He left United, and look what has happened with him. " 
Pogba has scored seven goals in 37 appearances this season to help Jose Mourinho 's EFL Cup finalists stay involved in all four competitions. 
He is set to face his other sibling Florentin, Mathias's twin, as United defend a 3-0 first leg lead at St Etienne in the Europa League on Wednesday.
